meanings.sent1: The donna walked gracefully down the street.
meanings.sent2: Every donna deserves to be treated with kindness and respect.
meanings.sent3: The donna accidentally wore mismatched socks to the party, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, filling it with the joy only a donna could bring.
meanings.sent5: The donna's kindness shone brightly, touching the hearts of all around her.

meanings.definition: A title of respect for a woman in Italy or Spain
meanings.sent1: In Italy, people address her as Donna Maria out of respect.
meanings.sent2: The title Donna is used to honor women in Spain.
meanings.sent3: Donna Sofia was so respected that even the birds sang her praises.
meanings.sent4: She carried herself with the grace and dignity befitting a Donna of her stature.
meanings.sent5: The title Donna symbolized her strength and elegance in the eyes of all who knew her.
